tokens.text: specifies the atmospheric scattering settings for Vibrant Visuals mode

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Atmosphere Identifier
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Set the identifier used for atmospherics in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Atmospheric Scattering JSON schemas under the "atmospherics" directory. Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

fields.title: Atmosphere Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of atmosphere definition to use
